name: Find Me! (BloodKillerr)
description:
Welcome!

Find Me! is a short, horror game I've created about a year ago. The game is created in my native language, so sorry for the inconvenience.

Controls are simple:
WASD - movement
F - flashlight
LMB - Interaction
ESC - menu

Music and sound effects were not created by me. All rights belong to their respective creators.
Please enjoy!
